entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:36 p.m. MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border early in the evening. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
